attributes.action: small charities to be exempt from buisness rates on energy by energy companys
attributes.additional_details: small volunteer charities cannot sustain the energy tariffs imposed by the big six companies, we are charged at business rates which are extortionate, and as the money to keep going is usually raised at local level it is a continuous struggle to stay solvent. we are not businesses but small groups of volunteers trying to do something for the community we live in. I therefore ask for your support.
